newsitem.title: FRANCE: PRESS DIGEST - France - Le Monde - July 25.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - France - Le Monde - July 25.

text.p: These are leading stories in afternoon daily Le Monde.

-- Prime Minister Lionel Jospin said in a radio interview this morning that the state would consider further cuts in state spending to prevent the public deficit from exceeding three percent of GDP in 1998.
-- European Commissioner for research and competitivity Edith Cresson says in an interview that the planned Boeing-McDonnell Douglas merger flouts competition law.
-- Guinness and GrandMet reject LVMH proposals to merge the three companies' wines and spirits activities, on grounds a Guinness-GrandMet merger would provide better shareholder value.
